name: webassembly-workflow
description: A WebAssembly shell project, set up with task runners, testing and CI for JS and C++

scripts.test: npm run js-tests && npm run cpp-tests
scripts.coveralls: npm run coverage -- --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && cmake .. && npm install
scripts.start: source ../emsdk_env.sh --build=Release && make KissFFT.js -f Makefile.emscripten && make WASMkissFFT.js -f Makefile.emscripten && emrun --no_browser --port 8000 .

author: Dan Ruta
